subject: Baseball
Executives and Management
Wages and Salaries
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Baseball’s general managers’ meetings seem to be notably down-scale this year, another indication that teams may show financial restraint regarding player salaries this off-season.
snippet: Baseball’s general managers’ meetings seem to be notably down-scale this year, another indication that teams may show financial restraint regarding player salaries this off-season.
